`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-solidity",children:`contract A {\r
/// foo simply returns true\r
function foo() public returns (bool) {\r
return true;\r
}\r
}\r
\r
contract B {\r
/// bar simply returns false\r
function bar() public returns (bool) {\r
return false;\r
